original_title: Sri Lanka’s access to Indian and African markets cannot be disrupted: RW
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe said Sri Lanka's access to the growing Indian market as well as the opening of African markets cannot be disrupted and should not be disrupted by big power, rivalry or conflict.
The President has said this while delivering a special statement at a discussion with Harvard University, the President's Media Division (PMD) said.

President invited the youth, including those in the diaspora, to play an active role in creating a better Sri Lanka and promised to include their ideas and recommendations in the country's roadmap for the future.
